edu.metrostate.ics372.thatgroup.clinicaltrial.catalog

Class ClinicalTrialCatalogUtilIty

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.metrostate.ics372.thatgroup.clinicaltrial.catalog.ClinicalTrialCatalogUtilIty

  • public class ClinicalTrialCatalogUtilIty
extends java.lang.Object
    The ClinicalTrialCatalogUtilIty is used to find the specific storage path for the trial catalog(s), get connections to the catalogs, and write and initialize new trial catalogs in the directory. The storage directory is dependent upon which operating system the user is currently using. The relevant storage paths are as follows:
    • Windows: Users\*user*\AppData\Roaming\That Group\Trial Catalogs
    • Linux: $HOME\.local\share\That Group\Clinical Trial Catalogs
    • MAC: Users\*user*\Library\That Group\Clinical Trial Catalogs
    Author:
    That Group

                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets a connection to a trial catalog for a specific trial depending on the name of the trial passed to the method.
        Parameters:

      • getEnvironmentSpecificStoragePath

        public static java.lang.String getEnvironmentSpecificStoragePath()
        Gets the storage path of the trial catalog(s) depending on the specific operating system the user is using. Supports specific paths for Windows, Linux, and OS X.
        Returns:
        path the environment specific storage path to store the trial catalog(s).
